description: Get the position information for a given wireless device or a wireless gateway resource. The position information uses the World Geodetic System (WGS84).

parameters.name: ResourceIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource for which position information is retrieved. It can be the wireless device ID or the wireless gateway ID, depending on the resource type.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of resource for which position information is retrieved, which can be a wireless device or a wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: GeoJsonPayload
nested_items.description: The position information of the resource, displayed as a JSON payload. The payload uses the GeoJSON format, which a format that's used to encode geographic data structures. For more information, see GeoJSON.
